title: Exclusive Tracker Finale Trailer Reveals Major Returning Character
description: Is Colter Shaw about to track down the truth about his father’s murder? The Tracker Season 2 finale is only one week away, and TVLine has an exclusive extended trailer. Airing Sunday, May 11 (CBS, 8/7c), the episode sees Colter return to Echo Ridge to investigate a diner owner’s disappearance, only to uncover a decades-old […]
author: Ryan Schwartz

title: Andor: Could Syril Handle the Dark Truth About Ghorman? Kyle Soller Hints at Tipping Point Ahead
description: Andor‘s Syril Karn may have just experienced “the greatest day of my life,” as he put it, but the harsh reality about the Empire’s actual plan for Ghorman threatens to come to light — which would in turn implode his relationship with rising ISB star Dedra Meero. In the Disney+/Star Wars series’ latest batch of […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich
